name: Sismo
intro: Reputation aggregation and privacy preserving access control
introduce: Sismo is a modular attestations protocol issuing ZK Badges for reputation portability and aggregation. The generation process of a ZK Badges relies on zero-knowledge proofs (ZKP) and ensures user and data privacy. Sismo's end goal is to enable diverse and interoperable Badges that can be meshed together in creative ways, and facilitate real innovation on authentication and reputation systems.
